class.name: std_trackers/LineTrackerMinJerk
class.description: This is a controller which follows a line from the current position to a given goal position using min jerk trajectory.

class.name: std_trackers/LineTrackerTrapezoid
class.description: This is a controller which follows a line from the current position to a given goal position using a trapezoidal trajectory.

class.name: std_trackers/LineTrackerDistance
class.description: This is a controller which follows a line from the current position to a given goal position using a trapezoidal trajectory with distance along the trajectory as the parameter instead of time.

class.name: std_trackers/LineTrackerYaw
class.description: This is a controller which follows a trapezoidal trajectory to a desired yaw.

class.name: std_trackers/VelocityTracker
class.description: This controller commands a desired velocity for the robot.

class.name: std_trackers/SmoothVelTracker
class.description: This controller goes from point A to point B trying to maintain constant velocity with a smooth ramp up.
